package.name: Ext3nder-Installer
package.dependencies: ldid, unzip, zip, sed, Darwin CC Tools, iOS Toolchain

descriptionlist.description: Cydia Ext3nder Installer Made by Julio Verne, Patched for iOS 11 by MidnightChips, includes jtool, named jtoold if you want to run it from command line, installed in /bin, if you don't like it you can remove it. Credit for jtool goes to Jonathan Levin

changelog.change: Streamlined the postinst, no more janky Shell scripts :), if you have an error, uninstall ext3nder then reinstall it.
